'''Maple Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Amur Maple in [[Yashiori Island]] and [[Ritou]]. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Maple Wood can be found around the [[Statue of The Seven]] of Yashiori Island. The trees only grow in the yellow area in the central region of the island.

They can also be found all around Ritou.

==Craft Usage==
{{Craft Usage}}

==Trivia==
* According to the description of [[The Wandering Bird Within]], the Amur Maple tree is native to [[Liyue]]; however, maple trees cannot be found in Liyue in-game.
